<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>78278</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>39537604-c68f-4b1f-bfc6-30d37cfe0646#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Az ökológiai piramis</string>
            <string language="en">The ecological pyramid</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die ökologische Pyramide</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La pyramide écologique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A pirâmide ecological</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La piramide ecologica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η οικολογική πυραμίδα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La pirámide ecológica</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Egy mező életközösségének ökológiai piramisa</string>
            <string language="en">Ecological pyramid of a field's biozoenosis</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">táplálkozási szintek,  mező életközössége,  termelők,  e3lsődleges fogyasztók,  másodlagos fogyasztók,  harmadlagos fogyasztók,  csúcsragadozó,  </string>
            <string language="en">alimentary levels, biozoenosis of a field, growers, primary consumers, secondary consumers, tertiary consumers, apical carnivorous</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ökologische Pyramide eines auffangene 
biozoenosis</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pyramide écologique du biozoenosis d'une zone</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pirâmide ecological do biozoenosis de um campo</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Piramide ecologica del biozoenosis del campo</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οικολογική πυραμίδα του biozoenosis ενός πεδίου</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Pirámide ecológica del biozoenosis de un campo</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">nährende Stufen, biozoenosis auffangene, Züchter,
Primärverbraucher, Sekundärverbraucher, tertiäre Verbraucher, 
apical fleischfressendes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">niveaux alimentaires, biozoenosis d'une zone, 
cultivateurs, consommateurs primaires, consommateurs secondaires, 
consommateurs tertiaires, carnivore apical</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">níveis alimentary, biozoenosis de um campo, growers, 
consumidores preliminares, consumidores secundários, consumidores 
tertiary, carnivorous apical</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">livelli alimentari, biozoenosis di un campo, 
coltivatori, consumatori primari, consumatori secondari, consumatori 
terziari, carnivoro apical</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διατροφικά επίπεδα, biozoenosis ενός πεδίου, 
καλλιεργητές, αρχικοί καταναλωτές, δευτεροβάθμιοι καταναλωτές, 
τριτογενείς καταναλωτές, ακραίος σαρκοφάγος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">niveles alimenticios, biozoenosis de un campo, 
cultivadores, consumidores primarios, consumidores secundarios, 
consumidores terciarios, carnívoro apical</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>

            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:BCSS Kft.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>144</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
